title: What is the plan for the damaged YMCA building? I realize there is ongoing limited activity in the six lane pool, but what about the remainder of the building?  I see no work going on when I pass by...no information at their website.
text:
The work is continuing on the building

Here's the last update we had

http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20150830/ARTICLES/150839991/0/search?p=1&tc=pg
